StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [M8412_Billet_Update]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID INT , @Billet VARCHAR(25) =null , @Billet_Date DATETIME=null , @Rank_ID INT=null , @MCD_ID INT=null , @Loca.on_ID INT=null , @Date_AFADBD DATETIME=null , @Date_Rank DATETIME=null , @Current_Loca.on VARCHAR(20)=null , @Phone_No VARCHAR(13)=null , @Date_8412I DATETIME=null , @Date_8412 DATETIME=null , @Date_Curr_Tour_Began DATETIME=null , @Date_Last_PCS DATETIME=null , @Date_Re.re DATETIME=null , @Date_Void DATETIME=null , @UserID varchar(15) =null AS set nocount on
DECLARE @SeqNo INT DECLARE @bilID INT
IF @Rank_ID = 0 set @Rank_ID = null
BEGIN -- new record IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT Person_ID FROM M8412_Recruit_Person WHERE Person_ID=@PersonID) BEGIN
INSERT INTO M8412_Recruit_Person VALUES( @PersonID , @Rank_ID , @MCD_ID , @Loca.on_ID , @Billet , @Billet_Date , @Date_AFADBD , @Date_Rank , @Current_Loca.on , @Phone_No , @Date_8412I , @Date_8412 , @Date_Curr_Tour_Began , @Date_Last_PCS , @Date_Re.re , @Date_Void , GETDATE() , @UserID , GETDATE() , @UserID ) END
-- Record exists ELSE BEGIN -- billet and billet date entered IF (ISNULL(LEN(@Billet_Date),0)!=0 OR ISNULL(LEN(@Billet),0)!=0) BEGIN UPDATE M8412_Recruit_Person SET Rank_ID = @Rank_ID , MCD_ID=@MCD_ID , Loca.on_ID=@Loca.on_ID , Billet=@Billet , Date_Billet=@Billet_Date , Date_AFADBD=@Date_AFADBD , Date_Rank= @Date_Rank , Current_Loca.on=@Current_Loca.on , Phone_No=@Phone_No , Date_8412I=@Date_8412I , Date_8412=@Date_8412 , Date_Curr_Tour_Began=@Date_Curr_Tour_Began , Date_Last_PCS=@Date_Last_PCS , Date_Re.re=@Date_Re.re , Date_Void=@Date_Void , Modi.ed_Date=GETDATE() , Modi.ed_By=@UserID WHERE Person_ID=@PersonID END -- no billet and billet date entered ELSE BEGIN UPDATE M8412_Recruit_Person SET Rank_ID = @Rank_ID , MCD_ID=@MCD_ID , Loca.on_ID=@Loca.on_ID , Date_AFADBD=@Date_AFADBD , Date_Rank= @Date_Rank , Current_Loca.on=@Current_Loca.on , Phone_No=@Phone_No , Date_8412I=@Date_8412I , Date_8412=@Date_8412 , Date_Curr_Tour_Began=@Date_Curr_Tour_Began , Date_Last_PCS=@Date_Last_PCS , Date_Re.re=@Date_Re.re , Date_Void=@Date_Void , Modi.ed_Date=GETDATE() , Modi.ed_By=@UserID WHERE Person_ID=@PersonID END END END
-- if no billet or no date entered, no history record added
IF (ISNULL(LEN(@Billet_Date),0)=0 OR ISNULL(LEN(@Billet),0)=0) GOTO ExitProc
SET @SeqNo=0 IF EXISTS (SELECT Person_ID FROM M8412_Recruit_History WHERE Person_ID=@PersonID) SELECT @SeqNo=max(Sequence_No) FROM M8412_Recruit_History WHERE Person_ID=@PersonID
SET @SeqNo= @SeqNo+1
select @bilID = Billet_ID from M8412_Lk_Billet where Billet=@Billet
INSERT INTO M8412_Recruit_History VALUES( @PersonID , @SeqNo , @bilID , @Billet , @Loca.on_ID , @Current_Loca.on , @Billet_Date , (CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(@Date_Re.re)) IS NOT NULL THEN @Date_Re.re WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(@Date_Void)) IS NOT NULL THEN @Date_Void ELSE GETDATE() END) , NULL , GETDATE() , @UserID , GETDATE() , @UserID )
Declare @ISeqNo int, @IBDate DATETIME, @IEDate DATETIME,
@IPreBDate DATETIME, @IPreSeq INT, @Cnt int
SET @IPreSeq=0 SET @IPreBDate='' SET @Cnt=0
DECLARE Cur_Per CURSOR FOR SELECT Sequence_No, Billet_Begin_Date, Billet_End_Date FROM M8412_Recruit_History WHERE Person_ID = @PersonID ORDER BY Billet_Begin_Date DESC
OPEN Cur_Per FETCH NEXT FROM Cur_Per INTO @ISeqNo,@IBDate,@IEDate WHILE (@@FETCH_STATUS =0) BEGIN IF @Cnt >0 BEGIN UPDATE M8412_Recruit_History SET Billet_End_Date =(CASE WHEN @Cnt=0 THEN GETDATE() ELSE @IPreBDate END) , Modi.ed_Date=GETDATE() , Modi.ed_By=@UserID WHERE Person_ID=@PersonID AND Sequence_No=@ISeqNo
END SET @Cnt = @Cnt + 1 SET @IPreSeq = @ISeqNo SET @IPreBDate=@IBDate
FETCH NEXT FROM Cur_Per INTO @ISeqNo,@IBDate,@IEDate END Close Cur_Per DEALLOCATE Cur_Per
-- 05/17/07 S.Kho Replace/Update the loca.on, the billet and the billet begin date in the background -- informa.on sec.on with the informa.on from the most recent billet in the billet history. DECLARE @TLoc VARCHAR(20), @TLocID INT, @TBillet VARCHAR(25)
IF @Cnt >0 BEGIN SELECT TOP 1 @TBillet = Billet , @IBDate=Billet_Begin_Date , @TLocID=Loca.on_ID , @TLoc=Loca.on FROM M8412_Recruit_History WHERE Person_ID = @PersonID ORDER BY Billet_Begin_Date DESC
UPDATE M8412_Recruit_Person SET Loca.on_ID=@TLocID , Current_Loca.on = @TLoc , Billet=@TBillet , Date_Billet=@IBDate , Modi.ed_Date=GETDATE() , Modi.ed_By=@UserID WHERE Person_ID = @PersonID END
ExitProc:
SET NOCOUNT ON
